text:
World First Ltd | Millbank Tower, London | Full time | ONSITE

World First is an established currency exchange company. We have a medium sized IT team looking for PHP developers to continue development on the existing World First systems. The stack is PHP|RabbitMQ|Apache/nginx|MySQL.

Job links below: Senior Developer: https://hire.jobvite.com/j?aj=okPz0fws&s=Hackernews Mid Developer: https://hire.jobvite.com/j?cj=oDKk0fwr&s=Hackernews

Need more information? Email victoria.bradford@worldfirst.com referencing HackerNews.
